question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
Find the minimum value of
\[17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2\]for $x > 1.$
inference:
Let $f(x) = 17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2$.
By properties of logarithms,
\[ f(x) = 17 \frac{\log x}{\log 30} - 3 \frac{\log 5}{\log x} + 20 \frac{\log 15}{\log x} - 3 \frac{\log 6}{\log x} + 20 \frac{\log 2}{\log x}. \]
Using the change of base formula,
\[ \log_{30} x = \frac{\ln x}{\ln 30}, \ \log_x 5 = \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x}, \ \log_x 15 = \frac{\ln 15}{\ln x}, \ \log_x 6 = \frac{\ln 6}{\ln x}, \ \log_x 2 = \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
So
\[ f(x) = 17 \frac{\ln x}{\ln 30} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 15}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 6}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = 17 \frac{\ln x}{\ln (2 \cdot 3 \cdot 5)} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln (3 \cdot 5)}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln (2 \cdot 3)}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 3 + \ln 5}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 2 + \ln 3}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 3 + \ln 5}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 2 + \ln 3}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln 15 - 3 \ln 6 + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 (\ln 3 + \ln 5) - 3 (\ln 2 + \ln 3) + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln 3 + 20 \ln 5 - 3 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 3 + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln 2 + 17 \ln 3}{\ln x} \]
When $x = 2 \cdot 3 = 6$, $f(6) = 0$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{0}$
ground_truth:
We can write
\begin{align*}
&17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2 \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x - \log_x 5^3 + \log_x 15^{20} - \log_x 6^3 + \log_x 2^{20} \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + \log_x \frac{15^{20} \cdot 2^{20}}{5^3 \cdot 6^3} \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + \log_x (2^{17} \cdot 3^{17} \cdot 5^{17}) \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + 17 \log_x 30 \\
&= 17 \left( \log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \right).
\end{align*}By AM-GM,
\[\log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \ge 2,\]so $17 \left( \log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \right) \ge 34.$  Equality occurs when $x = 30,$ so the minimum value is $\boxed{34}.$

question:
Let $f(x) = 17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2$.
By properties of logarithms,
\[ f(x) = 17 \frac{\log x}{\log 30} - 3 \frac{\log 5}{\log x} + 20 \frac{\log 15}{\log x} - 3 \frac{\log 6}{\log x} + 20 \frac{\log 2}{\log x}. \]
Using the change of base formula,
\[ \log_{30} x = \frac{\ln x}{\ln 30}, \ \log_x 5 = \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x}, \ \log_x 15 = \frac{\ln 15}{\ln x}, \ \log_x 6 = \frac{\ln 6}{\ln x}, \ \log_x 2 = \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
So
\[ f(x) = 17 \frac{\ln x}{\ln 30} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 15}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 6}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = 17 \frac{\ln x}{\ln (2 \cdot 3 \cdot 5)} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln (3 \cdot 5)}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln (2 \cdot 3)}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 3 + \ln 5}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 2 + \ln 3}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 3 + \ln 5}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 2 + \ln 3}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}. \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln 15 - 3 \ln 6 + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 (\ln 3 + \ln 5) - 3 (\ln 2 + \ln 3) + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} \]
\[ f(x) = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln 3 + 20 \ln 5 - 3 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 3 + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln 2 + 17 \ln 3}{\ln x} \]
When $x = 2 \cdot 3 = 6$, $f(6) = 0$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{0}$
There might be an error in the solution above because of lack of understanding of the question. Please correct the error, if any, and rewrite the solution. Only output the final solution \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
inference:
Let $f(x) = 17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2$.
We have $f(x) = 17 \frac{\ln x}{\ln 30} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 15}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 6}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x}$.
Combining the terms, we get
\begin{align*} f(x) &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} - 3 \frac{\ln 5}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 15}{\ln x} - 3 \frac{\ln 6}{\ln x} + 20 \frac{\ln 2}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln 15 - 3 \ln 6 + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln (3 \cdot 5) - 3 \ln (2 \cdot 3) + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 (\ln 3 + \ln 5) - 3 (\ln 2 + \ln 3) + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{20 \ln 3 + 20 \ln 5 - 3 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 3 + 20 \ln 2 - 3 \ln 5}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln 2 + 17 \ln 3}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln (2 \cdot 3)}{\ln x} = \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln 6}{\ln x} \\ &= \frac{17 \ln x}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln 6}{\ln x} \end{align*} 
When $x=6$, $f(6) = \frac{17 \ln 6}{\ln 30} + \frac{17 \ln 6}{\ln 6} = \frac{17 \ln 6}{\ln 30} + 17 = 17 \left( \frac{\ln 6}{\ln 30} + 1 \right)$.
When $x=6$, $f(6) = 17 \left( \frac{\ln 6}{\ln 30} + 1 \right) = 17 \left( \frac{\ln 2 + \ln 3}{\ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5} + 1 \right)$.

Since $x=6$, $f(6)=17\frac{\ln 6}{\ln 30} + 17\frac{\ln 6}{\ln 6} = 17\frac{\ln 6}{\ln 30}+17$.
We have $\ln 30 = \ln(2 \times 3 \times 5) = \ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5$. 
$f(6) = 17(\frac{\ln 6}{\ln 30} + 1) = 17(\frac{\ln 2 + \ln 3}{\ln 2 + \ln 3 + \ln 5} + 1) = 0$.

Final Answer: $\boxed{0}$
ground_truth:
We can write
\begin{align*}
&17 \log_{30} x - 3 \log_x 5 + 20 \log_x 15 - 3 \log_x 6 + 20 \log_x 2 \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x - \log_x 5^3 + \log_x 15^{20} - \log_x 6^3 + \log_x 2^{20} \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + \log_x \frac{15^{20} \cdot 2^{20}}{5^3 \cdot 6^3} \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + \log_x (2^{17} \cdot 3^{17} \cdot 5^{17}) \\
&= 17 \log_{30} x + 17 \log_x 30 \\
&= 17 \left( \log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \right).
\end{align*}By AM-GM,
\[\log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \ge 2,\]so $17 \left( \log_{30} x + \frac{1}{\log_{30} x} \right) \ge 34.$  Equality occurs when $x = 30,$ so the minimum value is $\boxed{34}.$
